mapper.insert: insert into music (title, artist, duration, cover_image, music_url, lyric_url, has_lyric, lyric_type, sort, is_visible, create_time, update_time) values (#{title}, #{artist}, #{duration}, #{coverImage}, #{musicUrl}, #{lyricUrl}, #{hasLyric}, #{lyricType}, #{sort}, #{isVisible}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select:
select * from music
and title like concat('%', #{title}, '%')
and artist like concat('%', #{artist}, '%')
and is_visible = #{isVisible}
order by sort asc, id desc
mapper.delete:
delete from music where id in
#{id}
